lead_paragraph: REPLY TO THE LETTER OF REV. J. S. GORSOCH.--The Attorney General or Pennsylvania, Mr. Franklin, has addressed a letter to Rev. J. S. Gorsuch, In reply to the assertions In the letter addressed by the latter to Gov. Johnston. Mr. Gorsuch imputed to the Governor and the Attorney-General Inactivity and gross dereliction of duty in regard to the murder of his father, near Christiana.
abstract: Reply to from atty Gen. of Penn.
